snippet.title: Nara: Facing Fire Coming To Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Nara: Facing Fire KICKSTARTER :) https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/glowing-glade/nara-facing-fire-a-hand-drawn-fantasy-metroidvania

Nara: Facing fire is a soulslike fantasy metroidvania inspired by Hollow Knight, Ori and Celeste with focus on fluid and responsive movement, difficult boss fights and thrilling escape sequences.

If you are interested or have any suggestions or ideas on how to improve the game please subscribe to our newsletter or join our Discord server. :)

Place with all links: http://linktr.ee/narafacingfire

Newsletter: http://eepurl.com/h6p2nL
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GlowingGlade
Discord: https://discord.gg/BSd8EwAYKr

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2087320/Nara_Facing_Fire/
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/glowing-glade/nara-facing-fire-a-hand-drawn-fantasy-metroidvania


If the game gets funded it will release on Steam and shortly after on Nintendo Switch.
After that most likely on Xbox and Playstation as well.



#metroidvania
#soulslike 
#indiegame 
#narafacingfire
#kickstarter
